Description:
Court Location Close To Township!
This home is in a court that's an ideal place to extend the kids playground. Playing in a court is so much fun with the neighbour's kids.This three bedroom plus study home is well placed on the block, elevated with the potential to make a great private outdoor entertainment area.Not far from the historic township of Drysdale. A place to enjoy working, resting and playing. All amenities required are available here; shopping centres, medical centres, public transport, schools, restaurants, cafes, wineries, bike trails, the list is exhaustive. Not your usual floorplan but very functional layout. Double garage with remote and off street parking also.

Description:
AS NEW, IMPRESSIVE STYLISH HOME
Located in Drysdale's aptly named Central Walk Estate, leafy parklands, village center and public transport are all just a short stroll away. Comprising formal lounge, second open plan living space with gourmet kitchen, dining and family room flowing onto the undercover alfresco entertaining area and landscaped gardens. 3 bedrooms, master with WIR and full ensuite, over-sized study which can be utilized as a theater room or sizable 4th bedroom, Central bathroom, laundry and separate W.C. Features are aplenty with central heating, split system, fans, walk in pantry, stone benches, quality fixtures and fittings, security system and loads of storage, double garage and water tank. Just add your personal touch to your new home, then unwind and relax in style.

Description:
Lifestyle Property in the Heart of Town
Set on over 2 acres, this fabulous lifestyle property offers all the delights of country living within easy reach of central Drysdale, renowned wineries, the beautiful bay and famous surf beaches, and less than 25 minutes from Geelong.
Welcomed by a sweeping gum lined driveway you will instantly feel relaxed arriving home to this lifestyle property. An orchard, multiple vegetable gardens and roomy chicken run provide tasty fresh produce, and with 3 gated, fenced paddocks there is space for horses, hobby farming or even a boutique vineyard.
Extensive landscaping and graceful trees surround the welcoming 3 bedroom home. Verandahs, awnings and double blinds deliver passive solar benefits and a 1,000 litre rainwater tank maintains lush greenery. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans create a comfortable climate supplemented by budget-friendly solar power.
Wide multi-paned windows and a sunlit north-facing alfresco bring a bright indoor-outdoor feel to open plan kitchen/dining/living. In the living area, the wood heater conjures tempting images of cosy winter evenings with a bottle of delicious local red. The kitchen includes a 900 mm oven with 5 burner gas cooktop, step-in pantry, large fridge space and plentiful storage. A pizza oven in the garden provides a crowd-pleasing alternative.
The master bedroom boasts a walk-in robe and en suite with shower, vanity and toilet. Across the hall, triple aspect windows bathe the serene lounge room in natural light. A second outdoor area completes this inviting retreat.
Two further bedrooms with generous built-in robes are placed away from the master suite and flank the bathroom and separate toilet, ensuring convenience and privacy. The laundry features expansive bench and storage space and handy external access.
Outside, a double carport and DLUG offer abundant parking and a versatile powered cubby holds potential as extra shedding or stabling. Residential A zoning will be of great interest to investors (STCA).
Experience the best of the Bellarine Peninsula in your own rural haven.
Insights: 71 Whitcombes Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECT LIVING ON YOUR OWN LAND, IN THE HEART OF DRYSDALE, (APP. 460 SQM)
An absolute delight, nothing to do except unpack and enjoy all on offer. Generous proportions and natural light throughout make a great start to this perfect home, the open plan space includes dining, excellent kitchen and living with doors opening to an undercover space , so easy to entertain and relax. Two big bedrooms, one with four BIR'S other 3, study, 2 way bathroom, powder room and laundry. Features include walk in pantry, split system, loads of storage, solar boosted hot water, quality furnishings, subtle colourings and matured leafy garden. Two garages, dual access allows for boat or more vehicles, a real plus. A prime position within walking distance of the shops, medical rooms, schools and parklands. Four top points: Own title, clever design, village position and so many extras. Please ring for an inspection.

Description:
Gem in Central Location!
Nestled away in a quiet and leafy street on a substantial 621m2 block, this cosy two bedroom home has so much to offer.
Featuring two sizeable bedrooms, both with BIR's, modest and bright North facing living/dining/kitchen area, separate laundry and bathroom, and a huge backyard with a wide access, this property has huge scope. Whether you decide to renovate, rent it out or even build out the back, it's entirely up to you!
Boasting subdivision opportunities STCA this is an entry level property that offers so much potential
Located within walking distance to the Drysdale retail hub this is an ideal central position close to amenities, cafes, medical facilities and schools.
A great opportunity that can't be missed!
Anna Jarczak

Description:
Family Living At Its Best On A Rare Parcel Of Approx 1,685m2
Undeniable family appeal comes to mind the second you lay eyes on this quality double brick home in a quiet position close to local shops and all amenities. Epitomising the phrase 'neat as a pin', this sensational home on an incredible 1,685m2 approx block would suit families looking for room to roam, seniors with a love of gardening or investors looking for safe returns in this growth corridor with subdivision potential (STCA).
Offering a rare parcel of land and affordability to match, the home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite) and 2 light filled living areas to accommodate the whole family with beautiful cathedral ceilings throughout. The central bathroom is pristine while the updated kitchen and quality appliances completes this compelling package.
Outside the home really sets itself apart with an undercover area and BBQ allowing room for entertaining friends and family, while the huge yard give kids and pets room to roam. For those that love spending time in the sun there are established gardens providing a private sanctuary to relax in. If that wasn't enough, the remote garage with storage for up to 4 cars and garden shed provides room for all the boys toys while allowing secure car accommodation.
Located only a five minute walk to the town centre, restaurants, and quality secondary schools, inspect what is a great opportunity.

Description:
An invitation - escape city life for the gentle pace of Drysdale
There's still time! Celebrate summer holidays and festive season at No 62. A large, welcoming, affordable, light and airy 'upside-down' home (lounge/dining/kitchen/study/master bedroom upstairs) awaits you, family and friends.
Boasting four spacious bedrooms, master bedroom with WIR and full ensuite adjacent to a huge study.
Enjoy the rolling hills by day, see lights of Geelong shimmer by night. Then, for the Cats' fans, the lights of Kardinia Park beckon.
Breath in fresh sea air, enjoy cooling summer breezes and snuggle up by the gas log fire in cooler months.
Take in spectacular sunsets from the large west facing balcony. Sip a glass (or two)...
or relax with coffee on lower deck nestled in easy maintenance native and deciduous garden.
Imagine celebrating with friends and family in large open plan living area upstairs and cool summer sitting room downstairs, along with all the features this generous 4 bedroom plus study home has to offer.
Within easy walking distance of Drysdale village, excellent schools, sporting facilities and every amenity. You can have it all: safe beaches, walking trails, parkland, lakes and abundant bird life.
Features include 4 Bedrooms, 2 bathrooms central gas heating/cooling, gas log fire, quality fittings and fixtures, dishwasher, built-in entertaining unit, ample storage throughout the home, garden sheds, double garage, balcony with views, convenient side access for boats and/or caravans and much, much more.
Having great neighbours is always an asset, peace and quiet as well friendliness always helps the feeling of contentment grow inside the satisfied home owner, add this homes comfortable in size, the family room along gives the feeling of opulence due to the sheer size and space not to mention the views. The home conditions is excellent to say the least, you get the feeling of love and care as you walk through, but also allowing you as the buyer your creative flare to add your own touches to this splendid property.
But we are forgetting the amazing investment opportunity that the home offers the astute investor.
Being approximately 5 minutes walking distance from Drysdale's Central Business District, with multiple shopping centres and car parking, this property is the perfect place to secure your dream home or ideal investment. Another wonderful point of difference this home provides is the ease of access to public transport just down the street as well as walking distance to local schools and ideal access to the Bellarine Peninsula, you can take advantage of the regions famous beaches and fishing hot spots, award winning wineries, cafes and restaurants and only a 20 minuet drive until your into the heart of Geelong's bustling CBD, really what more could you ask for?
Call or email to view without delay!
- Spectacular sunsets
- Huge master bedroom with WIR & full ensuite
- 4 generous bedrooms plus study
- Walking distance to Drysdale Village, excellent schools, sporting facilities
- Convenient side access for boats and/or caravans
- central gas heating/cooling, gas log fire
Land: 676 sq m approx.

Description:
Escape to Eden!
A uniquely quiet and tranquil location for a uniquely beautiful home! This contemporary yet surprisingly spacious cottage-style weatherboard, set at a peaceful court end, is nestled by stands of lush deciduous trees and sits adjacent to the Drysdale Reserve. The position provides easy access for children's sporting pursuits (cricket, tennis, football and netball), is within a 3-minute stroll of picturesque McClouds Water Holes and a 5-minute walk to the town centre shops and medical facilities. Close to a choice of sought-after primary and secondary schools, this home is ideal for the growing family.
Full of charming character and recent quality refurbishments, this split level home follows the lay of the land. Striking architectural features include the wide and elegant northwest-facing veranda proportioned for living and entertaining, the open plan central living hub with vaulted timber lined ceilings and the abundant full-height glazing that draws the serene garden into every room.
The open lounge, set close to the master bedroom at the façade, doubles as a comfy parents retreat or potential fourth bedroom. Windows in the lounge and master bedroom overlook the relaxed veranda, capturing vision of the delightful Wisteria-covered arbour that provides entry to the front yard. The master bedroom easily accommodates a king bed and offers a fresh ensuite with built-in and walk-in robes.
Further in, step up to the magical open plan living zone with dedicated spaces formal dining, living and kitchen/meals. This inviting space benefits from the spaciousness of the lofty ceiling, with the many windows and white decor ensuring gorgeous natural light. The dining area views the lush treetops and gardens below. A pretty Japanese courtyard and high-end Lopi gas fireplace provide a variety of views to the living zone. The kitchen is graced with the most tranquil garden views and has been modernised with bespoke Stringy Bark bench tops and stone-effect splashback. A suite of Chef cooking appliances and long breakfast bar make catering a breeze. The split system ensures comfort.
Step-up again to the minor bedroom zone at the rear. This private zone features 2 double bedrooms with built-in robes, a very large laundry with space for a sewing table or desk and yard access, a spotless and spacious family bathroom with bath and shower, and separate toilet.
The backyard is reminiscent of a ferny glade, with meandering garden paths, constant birdsong and an intimate pergola for private morning coffees and conversation. The lush gardens are calming and cool, shaded by a canopy of deciduous trees in the summer, with warm sun streaming through in winter. There is a fenced pet area and a detached single garage with a handy storage shed.
This home is delightfully individual - a special place!
- Characterful potential 4BR weatherboard cottage, with recent refurbishments, nestled by trees
- Unique picturesque court-end placement adjacent to the Drysdale Reserve
- Charming veranda, open lounge and master BR with en suite and robes at the facade
- Delightful central OP kitchen/living/dining with Lopi gas fire and garden aspect
- Minor BRs at rear with large laundry and fresh family bathroom
- Stunning tranquil gardens, very close to shops, schools, lakes and sports grounds
Land: 664 sq m approx.

Description:
The Perfect Downsizer
This exceptional 2 bedroom unit, located within walking distance to Drysdale shopping centre and bus stop, is the perfect downsizer or investment. Both spacious and bright this fantastic home has everything you need for a comfortable and easy living lifestyle.
Stepping inside you will be greeted by the inviting north facing lounge that is carpeted and flooded with natural light. The adjoining kitchen/meals area encompasses ample bench and cupboard space, dishwasher and a huge walk in pantry. Both large bedrooms are also carpeted, have built in robes and are serviced by a great sized bathroom plus separate laundry with a large built in linen cupboard.
Outside is a paved, undercover entertaining area which overlooks the established gardens, perfect to sit back with a coffee and read the paper. Additional features include single garage, split system air condition, ducted heating, plenty of extra storage space, established gardens and secure yard.
A stand out feature of this home is the second driveway for storage of a boat, caravan or second vehicle. Part of a great complex of eight other townhouses which are prominently owner occupied creating a real sense of security and community this is a gem of a home that will definitely go fast. Call for an inspection today!

Description:
The best of country and coast
Picturesque Drysdale offers the best of the country and coast complete with its own family-centric amenities and within easy commute of The Bellarine beaches and Geelong.
This fresh new 3/4 bedroom home, on approx. 4018sqm, boasts contemporary coastal style in a relaxed rural setting. With an emphasis on living, the open floor plan offers 4 living zones which surround a fabulous undercover deck and sundrenched in-ground pool. The detached double garage with shower room and toilet will also appeal.
The north facing living zones view the central pool, and are wrapped by wide decking encouraging a sought-after indoor outdoor lifestyle. Hardwood floors are warm and inviting and team perfectly with the timber windows and doors. Wide glazing, lofty ceilings and light modern decor ensure a spacious, well-lit interior.
The home enjoys the benefits of passive solar design with deep northern eaves repelling the summer sun. A wood burning fire and ceiling fans assist comfort and ambiance.
The central living hub incorporates the kitchen, sitting, dining, and family spaces, all with doors leading out to the poolside deck. The parents retreat and rumpus room also enjoy the northern aspect with seamless flow the deck.
The kitchen boasts a walk-in pantry, large central island bench, 900mm oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Enjoy entertaining from this storage laden culinary space with views over the pool.
Master bedroom is indeed a 'suite' with private retreat, en suite with bath, shower and twin basins and walk-in robe. Placed at the opposite end of the living hub, away from the other bedrooms, parents will love the privacy offered.
Bedrooms 2 and 3 offer built-in robes and sit near to the family bathroom with bath, shower and separate toilet. The laundry is proportioned for the needs of a family, complete with robe-like storage and yard access.
The roomy allotment has much potential and provides children and pets the privilege of space.
With the list of expensive optional extras ticked, this home presents as a unique opportunity to personalise your own coastal-rural dream. View without delay!
- New 3 BR home on approx. 4018sqm in picturesque Drysdale
- Contemporary coastal design with 4 living zones set around a north facing pool and deck
- Passive solar design, wood burning fire, hardwood floors, central kitchen with walk-in pantry
- Master bedroom a true 'suite' with private retreat, en suite and walk-in robe
- Detached garage for at least two cars with a shower room, toilet & workshop space
- The best of country and coast within easy commutes of Bellarine beaches and Geelong

Description:
Rural Retreat on 5 acres
An expansive home situated on 5 acres of land offering the best of country living. The home itself comprises 4 bedrooms, 2 with ensuites. The spacious home has a near new kitchen, study, large casual meals area and massive formal living and dining area. Outdoors is an abundance of space that has all the extras including an external bungalow, bird aviaries, fernery, entertainment/rumpus room, 4 lock up garages and a huge 4 car carport. All this plus the gentle sound of the birds and of course room for horses! Town water supply along with solar charged electric fencing. Absolute rural outlook offering a coastal/country lifestyle on the outskirts of Drysdale's town centre and situated between the Bellarine's best beaches and bays, wineries and restaurants. Currently leased till December 2016 @ $600 per week.

Address: Unit 9/23 Clifton Springs Road Drysdale VIC 3222
Description:
A DOWNSIZER, LOCATED WITHIN THE VILLAGE PRECINCT... PERFECT.
A one bedroom villa with the option of making it 2, nothing to do here but enjoy the convenient spot. The open plan living gives a great feel of extra space. Big kitchen space, dining, light and bright throughout. The main bedroom has the central 2 way bathroom operating as an ensuite, separate toilet and laundry. Features include gas heater, a/c, quality fittings, fans, outdoor blinds, good storage and more to entice. Double doors open to a private outdoor area. Single garage and garden shed.
Insights: Unit 9/23 Clifton Springs Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 1 other 1 bedroom unit in Drysdale have recently been sold.
